mdRecord.dcterms:title: Brooks Hall, exterior
Brooks House
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Maybeck, Bernard Ralph (American architect and artist, 1862-1957) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This small, brick dormitory for men has a central living room with wings that surround a courtyard. Its roof is made of cedar shakes stained in a soft gray. The dormitory was built in two stages, with the south wing coming to completion in 1939. On its west elevation, the building is two stories, but the east front is a single story. http://www.principia.edu/maybeck/build/brooks.htm [work]
